works.description:
My Website www.bbq-brethern.com is being parsed by a scraper site.  An example of the data being mined is below, however they are copying nearly all public content and posting it on their site under different names and different time.  I am and adsense subscriber, as is the scraper site.  They are using my data to drive traffic and searches to their site. 

Some samples of the the original content is listed below. These are samples, but the site is stealing ALL our copy written data on a daily basis and posting it on theirs, essentially duplicating my forums content. 

All samples below show EXACT duplicates of our postings in its entirety.

below is a list of the forum indexes. Since the scraper only periodically throughout the day parses the site, and my site is very active, the indexes may not match at the time of viewing, however, you will notice that ALL content in the offending site is within my index.
